org.intermine.biovalidator.validator.fasta.sequencevalidator

Interface SequenceValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSequenceValidator, GenericSequenceValidator, NucleicAcidSequenceValidator, NucleicAcidSequenceValidatorWithArray, ProteinSequenceValidator

    public interface SequenceValidator
    An immutable sequence validator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValid(java.lang.String sequence)
      Test whether a sequence is valid or not
      boolean isValidLetter(char c)
      Test whether a particular letter is valid or not
      int validate(java.lang.String sequence, long seqLineNo, ValidationResult result)
      Test whether a sequence is valid or not.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        int validate(@Nonnull
             java.lang.String sequence,
             long seqLineNo,
             @Nonnull
             ValidationResult result)
        Test whether a sequence is valid or not. Returns the length of the sequence it validates and can optionally add errors or warning to ValidationResult if there is any validation error
        Parameters:
        sequence - sequence that is to be validated
        seqLineNo - line number of the sequence inside the source data, it can be used to reference the line number of the error while creating validation failure message
        result - validation result where validation error can be added
        Returns:
        return boolean indicating failure or success

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(@Nonnull
                java.lang.String sequence)
        Test whether a sequence is valid or not
        Parameters:
        sequence - sequence to be validated
        Returns:
        validation result

      • isValidLetter

        boolean isValidLetter(char c)
        Test whether a particular letter is valid or not
        Parameters:
        c - letter to be validated
        Returns:
        returns whether letter is valid or not
